backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor definition.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing deployment requirements and listing related components and files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all major frontend files including components, sections, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining OKLCH-based color tokens and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing meta tags, root mount point, and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing the site's header, sections, and footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/Sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with company description, highlights list, and a visual stats card.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Contact: Contact section with a validated inquiry form, contact info cards, and business hours.
frontend/src/components/Sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with headline, tagline, intro text, background image, and scroll-to-section buttons.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Service: Displays a grid of service cards using mapped icons and content from siteCopy.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with logo, navigation links, services list, copyright, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Provides all static site copy including hero text, about section, and detailed descriptions for each service.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, logout, and stored‑identity restoration via a React context/provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no backend queries for this static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a construction‑themed color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s requirements, features, issues, and current build-related problems.
